Articles.Content:
I love to see you back. Love the explosions! Mainly, because I love explosions overall. Can't wait to see more progress.

Yes that one, she said that was her... This discussion will not be continued any further:

1. Because I'm scared of Odin

and 2. Ok, she's a girl, Full stop.

Thank you, nice to be back, despite still being in a bit of a face-rending bloodrage over the whole ordeal.

1. You should be equally afraid of both Odin and myself, for when you die you'll either go to Valhalla and chill, hang out and do manly things with Odin... or you'll go to FÃƒÂ³lkvangr, and I get to decide what to do with you. And you don't want that.

2. With an assault rifle, turn that full stop into a quickmarch in the opposite direction ;P

Thank you, nice to be back, despite still being in a bit of a face-rending bloodrage over the whole ordeal.

1. You should be equally afraid of both Odin and myself, for when you die you'll either go to Valhalla and chill, hang out and do manly things with Odin... or you'll go to FÃƒÂ³lkvangr, and I get to decide what to do with you. And you don't want that.

2. With an assault rifle, turn that full stop into a quickmarch in the opposite direction ;P

1. As a Dutch person, I have Wodan to worry about. And the people who go to the FÃƒÂ³lkvangr are chosen and the other half is dumped in the Valhalla. And if I don't die in combat I'll go to Hell in her Helheim no matter what (Unless everyone and everything is upset about my death. And yes, just like Baldr, I'm going to fail.).

2. Okay... Bye! Good luck with PfL, Merry christmas, Happy new year aaaand I'm off!

There can be worse things than being trapped in FÃƒÂ³lkvangr. You could end up being immortal and trapped with Chobit.

Edited May 18, 2013 by LeonG17

Good, cause that's the one I'm working on ^.^

[EDIT]: After Trekkette and I go to the theater and see Star Trek: Into Darkness

Wellll, about that... not so much.

So, I might be spending the afternoon writing. Or I might curl up in a ball, eat chocolate and take a nap. One or the other.

Why should I bother continuing PfL?

There are more people who like PfL than there are mods and admins.
and there are fans amongst the mods and admins too
I am a fan of PfL.

and there are fans amongst the mods and admins too

Boosting the numbers of fans further! Hooray for PfL

There are more people who like PfL than there are mods and admins.
and there are fans amongst the mods and admins too
I am a fan of PfL.

This... These reactions are just priceless.

Good to know there are this much PfL fans among the admins and moderators.
Captain Skunky is a huge fan too, he in fact was the catalyst that made me draw more than one image

Welcome back. Now I have another omnipotent being to be afraid of.

I'll just sit in the corner playing Mass Effecty 3 this whole thing blows over.
You are giving us more reasons to love Captain Skunky.

Welcome back Chobit, happy to hear that your continuing pfl!

Also is it possible to upload custom websites to wix, so people with bad browsers (like me) can actually see pfl?
Wix uses HTML5, if your browser can't use that then WTF kind of dark ages browser are you running on?

Agreed, it is the responsibility of the user to download a standards compliant browser. not the website developers responsibility to simultaneously meet current, deprecated, and proprietary standards.

BTW chobit, what is that "access restricted" button all about? Is there some secret area with more pics?

BTW chobit, what is that "access restricted" button all about? Is there some secret area with more pics?

Hentai doujin

That's where the fanfic will go once Trekkette finishes each chapter

Hentai doujin

I'll take one ticket please!

Hentai doujin

That's where the fanfic will go once Trekkette finishes each chapter

No speaka de eenglish. Vat is "fanfic," "Trekkette" et "chapter"?

xD
